headline: BS Limited's board meeting November 11, 2017
description: We would like to inform your good selves due to unavoidable circumstances the Board  Meeting scheduled on November 11, 2017.
articleBody: we would like to inform your good selves due to unavoidable circumstances the  Board  Meeting scheduled on November 11, 2017 is pre-poned  and  scheduled to be held on Friday, November 10, 2017 at the Corporate Office of the Company, situated at 304, Trendset Towers, Road No. 2, Banjara Hills, Hyderabad 500034, Telangana.  In this regard, please find enclosed a copy of Notice of the Board Meeting.  We request you to take the same on record.  Source : BSE

headline: BS Limited's board meeting on  August 10, 2017
description: A Meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Thursday, August 10, 2017 at the Corporate Office of the Company, to consider, publish and take on record, the Un-Audited Financial Results for the Quarter ended June 30, 2017.
articleBody: A Meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Thursday, August 10, 2017 at the Corporate Office of the Company, situated at 504, Trendset Towers, Road No. 2, Banjara Hills, Hyderabad 500034, Telangana inter-alia amongst other Items as per the Agenda, to consider, publish and take on record, the Un-Audited Financial Results for the Quarter ended June 30, 2017.Source : BSE

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: BS director Mahesh Kumar Khera resigns
description: BS has informed that Mr. Mahesh Kumar Khera, Director of the Company, has resigned, vide his Letter dated December 30, 2016, from the Directorship of the Company with immediate effect. The Board of Directors of the Company by way of a Circular Resolution passed today i.e. January 02, 2017, has accepted his resignation.
articleBody: BS Ltd has informed BSE that Mr. Mahesh Kumar Khera, Director of the Company, has resigned, vide his Letter dated December 30, 2016, from the Directorship of the Company with immediate effect.The Board of Directors of the Company by way of a Circular Resolution passed today i.e. January 02, 2017, has accepted his resignation and consented to relieve Mr. Mahesh Kumar Khera of his duties and responsibilities vested by the Board as Director, with effect from January 01, 2017.Source : BSE Read all announcements in BS Limited

headline: BS managing director Kamesh Yalamarty resigns
description: BS has informed that Mr. Kamesh Yalamarty, Managing Director of the Company, has resigned, vide his Letter dated March 18, 2016, from the post of Managing Director as well as from the Directorship of the Company with immediate effect. The Board of Directors of the Company by way of a Circular Resolution passed on March 22, 2016.
articleBody: BS Ltd has informed BSE that Mr. Kamesh Yalamarty, Managing Director of the Company, has resigned, vide his Letter dated March 18, 2016, from the post of Managing Director as well as from the Directorship of the Company with immediate effect.The Board of Directors of the Company by way of a Circular Resolution passed on March 22, 2016 has accepted his resignation and consented to relieve Mr. Kamesh Yalamarty of his duties and responsibilities vested by the Board as Managing Director, with immediate effect.Source : BSE Read all announcements in BS Limited

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'Faizan Javed'}
headline: BS Ltd's Q2 net profit rises by 18% at Rs 16 crore
description: The company had recorded net profit of Rs 13.67 crore in Q2FY15. Total revenue of the company in Q2FY16 was at Rs 606 crore against Rs 471 crore in Q2FY15, a company statement said.
articleBody: BS Limited, a listed integrated services provider for power transmission and distribution, said its standalone net in the second quarter was up by 18 percent at Rs 16 crore. The company had recorded net profit of Rs 13.67 crore in Q2FY15. Total revenue of the company in Q2FY16 was at Rs 606 crore against Rs 471 crore in Q2FY15, a company statement said. Total income on a consolidated basis rose by 43 percent to Rs 1,023 crore in the period under review, from Rs 713 crore in the year-ago period. EBIDTA in the reporting period grew by 41 percent and stands at Rs 89.67 crore. On a half-yearly basis, the consolidated total turnover of the company for H1FY16 is Rs 1,993.43 crore, around 64 percent growth over the year-ago period. Consolidated net profit in H1FY16 jumped to Rs 44.37 crore, a rise of 28 percent over the year-ago period. &quot;The opportunity in the power transmission sector over the next three-four years is a humongous Rs 3 lakh crore domestically and the global opportunity is about USD 1 trillion,&quot; BS Limited chairman Rajesh Agarwal said. &quot;BS Limited, with its proficiency in EPC and aided by our strengthening foothold in the international markets, is best placed to tap growth and create value for all its stakeholders,&quot; he added. We have generated 41 percent of Q2FY16 net sales from the subsidiaries and joint ventures against 34 percent in Q2FY15, Agarwal said.
tags: BS Limited, EBIDTA, Results, second quarter, standalone net
